---
id: scan
---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## scan() function

返回从左侧连续归约的值的 Iterable/AsyncIterable。它类似于 reduce。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function scan<A extends readonly []>(
  f: Arrow,
  iterable: A,
): IterableIterator<never>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = scan((acc, cur) => acc * cur, 1, [1, 2, 3, 4]);
iter.next(); // {value: 1, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: 1, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: 2, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: 6, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: 24, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: undefined, done: true}

// with pipe
pipe(
  [1, 2, 3, 4],
  scan((acc, cur) => acc * cur),
  toArray,
); // [1, 2, 6, 24]
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/scan.ts)
